name: The Bureau of European Design Associations
goal: BEDA exists to ensure permanent liaison between its Members and the authorities of the European Union in order to communicate and promote the value of design innovation to European culture, economy, environment, society and governance.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
• Design Management
• Design and Public Procurement
• Design Profession
• Design and IPR
• Design Skills
• Design for Circular Economy
